Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm datdenkikniet, from the netherlands, and I just wanted to say hi!

I've played KSP for quite a while now, and thought I should introduce myself. I hope I can help people/people can help me .

- Datdenkikniet
Welkom aan boord! It's always nice to get players of a different ethnicity! I always say the world isn't mixed enough yet. I hope you'll have a lot of fun here!

Welkom aan boord! It's always nice to get players of a different ethnicity! I always say the world isn't mixed enough yet. I hope you'll have a lot of fun here!

thanks, theBiggest97 (yeah, I know Latin, hihi). I am already enjoying the forums very much. I hope to become a guy like you in the near future!

I hope to become a guy like you in the near future!

At first I was like and then I was like and then I was like

Thanks a million!
